name: Sky Guardians
description:
Play as Sky Guardians; defeat the Cloud Boss by combining your shots to create a Power Blast.

Made at the Purple Monkey Game Jam 2015.  

Updated to version 0.7 on 3.15.2018

Instructions:

  • 2-Player Game (1-player CPU mode)
  • Combine each other's shots to make a Power Blast
  • Use Power Blast to dismember the Cloud Boss, if you destroy all his body parts, you win.
  • Shoot Mini Clouds for points
  • When Health is depleted, you are frozen for 12 seconds. If both players are frozen at once, the game is over.

Credits

  • Jon Bellini - Developer & Sound Design (http://www.jonbellini.com)
  • Nick Criscuolo - Background Art, Animation, Music & Sound (http://nickquest.com/)
